status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
This is a suggestion to return the versionName for "Ti.App.version" instead of the value of the <version/> tag, if specified. There is already the {{Ti.App.Android.versionName}}, but we personally would love to have the value thats actually responsible for the release (e.g. value in the build.gradle of the app).

If that's not a good idea, feel free to resolve as invalid.
fields.summary: Android: Return versionName for "Ti.App.version", if specified
